name: Spherical Smackdown
description:
A competitive two player physics based game where you have to push the other player out of bounds by slamming waves from your bounce.

Controls:

  • Grab a friend and play together!
  • This game is configured for Xbox 360 or Playstation Controllers
    (plug them in first)
  • You can also use the arrows or W A S D to move and SPACEBAR to slam
  • Press spacebar to slam

Game created for the 2017 Global Game Jam by Rachel Bazelais, David Wallin, Jeffrey Liu & Adriane Kuzminski.

Made in Unity
